page.title: 04LOCAL NEWS
page.content: The yellow Gribbins won the Super Teams.Sports Day was won by green Rame. Ruth White was outstanding in pacing her 4 lap race at the Inter Schools Athletic evening. The Water Sports were won by blue Towan. The Fun Run was held at Polgover with the boggy,sticky bit. A group went to H.M.S.Raleigh for a fun swim.No winner was announced but each 1st,2nd,&3rd had a certificate. Twenty_two children went to Trenant where Lucy Chapman's Grandad lives.We camped under an Alex oak.We had 5 tents and 1 caravan. At Morval Fete the children performed country dancing and gymnastics.Cake, raspberries and cream were sold.People tried apple bobbing and greasy pole. The school received Â£150.
